b.js(9,24): error TS8011: Type arguments can only be used in TypeScript files.
b.js(15,24): error TS8011: Type arguments can only be used in TypeScript files.


==== a.ts (0 errors) ====
    export class A<T> {}
    
==== b.js (2 errors) ====
    import { A } from './a.js';
    
    export class B1 extends A {
        constructor() {
            super();
        }
    }
    
    export class B2 extends A<string> {
                           ~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS8011: Type arguments can only be used in TypeScript files.
        constructor() {
            super();
        }
    }
    
    export class B3 extends A<string, string> {
                           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS8011: Type arguments can only be used in TypeScript files.
        constructor() {
            super();
        }
    }
